summary: Cut Magento APM deploy defaults over to Datadog tracer envs and remove legacy profiler bootstrap env wiring

changes.description: Deploy worker now emits Datadog tracer env defaults (`DD_TRACE_*`, `DD_SERVICE`, `DD_ENV`) for Magento services and stops generating `MAGE_PROFILER` payloads.
Upgrade migration now reconciles existing Magento service env vars to Datadog tracing and removes legacy profiler/OTLP env keys from running stacks.
